name: Sarthak Travels & Holidays
tagline: Sarthak Tour & Travels — Your Journey, Done Right
description: Sarthak Travels & Holidays is a multi-service travel company offering reliable taxi services, exclusive tour packages, hotel bookings, and vintage car rentals in Uttarakhand. We pride ourselves on punctuality, safety, and customer satisfaction. Whether it's a Char Dham Yatra, a honeymoon trip to Mussoorie, or a vintage car for your wedding, we provide clean, safe, and comfortable travel experiences with complete transparency and 24×7 support.

usps.title: 24x7 Availability
usps.description: Round-the-clock support for all your travel needs.

usps.title: Verified Hotels
usps.description: We partner only with top-rated and safe hotels.

usps.title: Best Price Guarantee
usps.description: Competitive pricing with no hidden charges.
